name: Name
subject: Subject
mission_statement: To promote and support the production of all official statistics and information to the highest scientific standards, professional ethics, and international best practice
request_for_approval_for_survey_poll: Request for Approval for Survey / Poll- Survey
does_not_represent_the_original_populati: Does not represent the original population
invalid_email: Invalid email address, please enter a valid email address.
invalid_date: Invalid date, please enter a valid date.
sample_size_must_be_number: Sample size must be a number
sample_size_must_be_greater_than_zero: Sample size must be greater than zero
sample_size_must_be_integer: Sample size must be an integer
to_date_must_be_later_than_from_date: To date must be later than from date
feedback_intro: We surely trust you are one of the important sources in the process of developing and improving the statistical and informational work in Oman. It is my pleasure to communicate directly with you through this tool to receive suggestions and opinions for development purposes.
footer_copyright: © National Centre For Statistics & Information © 2025 - The content of this website is licensed under the Open Government License - Sultanate of Oman.
under_the_statistics_and: Under the Statistics and Information Law promulgated by Royal Decree No. 55/2001, and its Executive Regulations issued by Decree No. 9/2023AD; it is stated that non-governmental entities and individuals shall not conduct any survey without obtaining a statistical license; while governmental entities may conduct statistical activities upon obtaining the approval of the Center.
web_link_for_stat: Web link for Statistics and Information Law
all_gov_non_gov: All governmental and non-governmental entities and individuals of students, researchers and academics.
steps_to_req_service: What Are The Steps To Request The Service?
steps_to_req_description: 1. Log in to the Center’s portal (for governmental and non-governmental entities using smart cards, and for individuals using Civil ID Number). 2. Filling the e-form. 3. Attach complementary documents – determined by Article No. (5) of the Executive Regulations of Statistics and Information Law. 4. Pay fees of the statistical activity (for non-governmental entities). 5. Extract the ID for the person in charge of the statistical activity – Article No. (17) of the Executive Regulations.
a_decision_on_the_application: A decision on the application for statistical licensing shall be made within (30) thirty days from the date of submitting the request and submitting the required documents.
daily_actual_number: Daily actual number of the population in Oman as per the ROP records according the following criteria:
includes_all_alive: Includes all alive Omanis holding an official valid documentregistered in the National Civil System, or even expired but for less than ten years.
include_all_residents: Includes all residents holding valid visas and theirpresence is not required in the Sultanate within the period allowed by law. Residents with expired visas for a maximum of two years and companions holding valid visas are also included provided that they are in the country.
note_that_the_residence: Note that the residence visa for expatriates includes    residence visa for a wife of an Omani, student resident,  multiple entry visa, employment visa, employment contracting   visa, official visit visa, investor visa. The companions visa includes Family Joining visas and relat​ive/ friend visit visa.
your_comment_should_not_exceed_400_harac: Your comment should not exceed 400 character
meta_des_publications: National Centre for Statistics and Information - Our Mission is to produce the official statistics for Sultanate of Oman, which will be used to support the decision and policy makers to formulate and design the adopted national policies and programs. As well, information disclosure is considered as one of our important goals and a core of our mission.
General_Authority_for_Statistics,_Kingdo: General Authority for Statistics, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
Information_&_eGovernment_Authority__Kin: Information & eGovernment Authority __ Kingdom of Bahrain
Official_data_portal_of_the_UAE_Governme: Official data portal of the UAE Government
Arab_Institute_for_Training_&_Research_i: Arab Institute for Training & Research in Statics
terms_of_use_paragraph1: The data available in this site is open, and no license is required to use/re-use it.
terms_of_use_paragraph2: When you come across to some statistics that may interfere privacy of others, kindly cooperate with the Centre to protect that privacy and inform the Centre about it.
terms_of_use_paragraph3: The data should not be used illegally either where you are, or where we are.
terms_of_use_paragraph4: We provide web-services through API to exchange data and metadata to be embedded into your application. All these services are certain to failure. We might improve them from time to -time, so you may experience some of your services not working. We may also stop providing any service, or block access to our services to anyone for any reason.
privacy_policy_list1_li: This site has been designed, developed and maintained by the
privacy_policy_list1_p: National Centre for Statistics and Information, Sultanate of Oman.
privacy_policy_list2: The Centre pays utmost attention to the privacy and trust of the portal’s visitors, hence the centre registers only the minimal personal information needed for the quality of its services.
privacy_policy_list3: The personal information is defined to be as any relevant information pertaining to a known person or someone that is possible to identify and who is the subject of the information; which is the same information that an individual possibly submits during a visit to the government electronic offices or when filling out forms such as the person's name, address and telephone number.
privacy_policy_list4: During your visit and your browsing through the electronic portal, we collect statistical data in order helping us develop and improve our services and the electronic content.
privacy_policy_list5: Some of the pages of this portal use (cookies), which are files that are stored in the visitor's computer and are used to save the visitor's time so that he wouldn't need to provide such information repeatedly; you can go through your browser's settings and reject (cookies) or request to be notified when the website tries to send your (cookies).
privacy_policy_list6: The information reported in this site can include links or references to data, and are maintained by non-governmental organisations. The objective of providing these links is to , make accessing  the information more convenient.
privacy_policy_list7_li: By choosing a link to an external website, you have left the
privacy_policy_list7_name: National Centre for Statistics and Information
privacy_policy_list7_end: site, and hence you are subject to the privacy and security policies of the owners / providers of those websites.
privacy_policy_list8: The Statistics and Information Law, issued under Royal Decree No. (55/2019), ensures the confidentiality of all individual data collected for official statistical purposes.
privacy_policy_list9_p: The National Centre for Statistics and Information
privacy_policy_list9_li: is not liable for any damage or loss of any kind as a result of the use of this site either directly or indirectly.
national_summary_data_title: Data linked from this page correspond to data described in the International Monetary Fund’s DSBB. For a fuller explanation of the DSBB and the enhanced General Data Dissemination System in which Country participates,
